title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 19 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 19 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: The left needs more mask mandates and more lockdowns to pass their socialist agenda. Stock market is down on new covid news. How long can the liberal media maintain this atmosphere of fear? Are we headed for a covid civil war? The L.A. lockdown is not based in science. An attack on the First Amendment, Biden Administration gives lists to Facebook to censor any news they see as "disinformation." Protests in France over new stricter vaccine protocols. People are hesitant for the vaccine because of contradictory information from public officials. Unvaccinated kids aged 2 and up should keep wearing masks, pediatrics group says. Kids under 12 are not yet eligible for COVID-19 vaccines.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
